class.name: Akima761Method
class.documentation: Generates contour lines from an irregularly-distributed set of points.

parameter.name: contour_akima_x_resolution
parameter.documentation: X Resolution of the Akima output matrix
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter resolutionX sent to new Magics[AKIMA760].

parameter.name: contour_akima_y_resolution
parameter.documentation: Y Resolution of the Akima output matrix
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter resolutionY sent to new Magics[AKIMA760].
